description:
Miki and the boys head to the TV studio for a singing show. There, they get a picture with idol Hanayashiki Mira, who turns out to be a huge fan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wareware wa Doko kara Kita no ka, Wareware wa Nanimonoka, Wareware wa Doko e Iku no ka
Where Do We Come From? What Are We? Where Are We Going?
我々はどこから来たのか, 我々は何者か, 我々はどこへ行くのか
